mapper.sql: id, company_name, regist_item_id, year, title, ipe_id, file_name, status, creater, created_time, updater, updated_time, remark, province, city, district
ir.id, ir.company_name, ir.regist_item_id, ir.year, ir.title, ir.file_name, r.address, ir.province, ir.city, ir.district
mapper.select:
select
from ipe_industry_record where id > #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id asc limit 10

select count(1) from ipe_industry_record ir,regist_item r where ir.regist_item_id = r.id
and ir.company_name like concat(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and ir.year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ir.title like concat(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and r.address like concat(#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select
from ipe_industry_record ir,regist_item r where ir.regist_item_id = r.id
and ir.company_name like concat(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and ir.year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ir.title like concat(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and r.address like concat(#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit #{startRow},#{pageRows}

select count(1) from ipe_industry_record where 1 = 1
and company_name like concat('%',concat(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and title like concat('%',concat(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
SELECT file_name FROM ipe_industry_record where status = 1 GROUP BY file_name HAVING (count(file_name)) > 1 ORDER BY file_name LIMIT 10

mapper.update:
update ipe_industry_record
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_item_id = #{registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ipe_id = #{ipeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ipe_industry_record set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_item_id = #{registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ipe_id = #{ipeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select year,file_name from ipe_industry_record where regist_item_id = #{registItemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY year order by year DESC
select regist_item_id from ipe_industry_record where year=2017
